Verses: 1 aagaiyaal, Kiristhuvaippatri Solliya Moola Ubadhesa Vasanangalai Naam Vittu, Seththa Kiriyaigalukku Neengalakum Manandhirumpudhal, Dhevanperil Vaikkum Visuvaasam,

2 snaanangalukkaduththa Ubadhesam, Kaigalai Vaikkudhal, Mariththorin Uyirththezhudhal, Niththiya Niyaayaththeerppu Enbavaigalaagiya Asthibaaraththai Marupadiyum Podaamal, Pooranaraakumpadi Kadandhupovomaaga.
3 dhevanukku Siththamaanaal Ippadiyeseyvom.
4 enenil, Orudharam Piragaasippikkappattum, Parama Eevai Rusipaarththum, Parisuththa Aaviyai Petrum,
5 dhevanudaiya Nalvaarththaiyaiyum Inivarum Ulagaththin Belangalaiyum Rusipaarththum,

6 marudhaliththupponavargal, Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranai Thaangale Marupadiyum Siluvaiyil Araindhu Avamaanappaduththugirapadiyaal, Mananthirumpugiradharkedhuvaai Avargalai Marupadiyum Pudhuppikkiradhu Koodaadhakaariyam.
7 eppadiyenil, Thanmel Adikkadi Peygira Mazhaiyai Kudiththu, Thannidaththil Payiridugiravargalukketra Payirai Mulaippikkum Nilamaanadhu Dhevanaal Aaseervaadham Perum.
8 mulchedigalaiyum Mulpoondugalaiyum Mulaippikkira Nilamo Thagaadhadhaayum Sabikkappadugiradharketradhaayumirukkiradhu; Sutterikkappaduvadhe Adhin Mudivu.
9 piriyamaanavargale, Naangal Ippadi Sonnaalum Nanmaiyaanavaigalum, Ratchippukkuriyavaigalumaana, Kaariyangal Ungalidaththil Undaayirukkiradhendru Nambiyirukkirom.

10 enendraal, Ungal Kiriyaiyaiyum, Neengal Parisuththavaangalukku Oozhiyanjseydhadhinaalum Seydhu Varugiradhinaalum Thamadhu Naamaththirkaaga Kaanbiththa Anbulla Pirayaasaththaiyum Marandhuvidugiradharku Dhevan Aneedhiyullavarallave.
11 neengal Asadhiyaayiraamal, Vaakkuththaththamaana Aaseervaadhangalai Visuvaasaththinaalum Neediya Porumaiyinaalum Sudhandhariththukkollugiravargalai Pinpatrugiravargalumaayirundhu,
12 ungalukku Nambikkaiyin Poorana Nichchayamundaagumpadi Neengal Yaavarum Mudivubariyandham Appadiye Jaakkiradhaiyai Kaanbikkavendumendru Aasaiyaayirukkirom.
13 aabiragaamukku Dhevan Vaakkuththaththampanninapodhu, Aanaiyidumpadi Thammilum Periyavar Oruvarumillaadhapadiyinaale Thamadhu Perile Thaane Aanaiyittu:
14 nichchayamaaga Naan Unnai Aaseervadhikkave Aaseervadhiththu, Unnaipperugave Perugappannuven Endraar.
15 andhappadiye, Avan Porumaiyaai Kaaththirundhu, Vaakkuththaththampannappattadhai Petraan.
16 manushar Thangalilum Periyavarperil Aanaiyiduvaargal; Urudhipannumpadikku Aanaiyidudhale Sagala Vivaadhaththirkum Mudivu.

17 andhappadi, Dhevanum Vaakkuththaththam Pannappattavaigalai Sudhandhariththukkollugiravargalukku Thamadhu Aalosanaiyin Maaraadha Nichchayaththai Paripooranamaai Kaanbikkumpadi Siththamullavaraai, Or Aanaiyinaale Adhai Sthirappaduththinaar.

18 namakku Mun Vaikkappatta Nambikkaiyai Patrikkollumpadi Adaikkalamaai Odivandha Namakku Irandu Maaraadha Viseshangalinaal Niraindha Aarudhalundaagumpadikku Evvalavenum Poiyuraiyaadha Dhevan Appadi Seydhaar.
19 andha Nambikkai Namakku Nilaiyum Urudhiyum Thiraikkullaaga Pogiradhumaana Aaththuma Nangooramaayirukkiradhu.
20 namakku Munnodinavaraagiya Yesu Melkisedhekkin Muraimaiyinpadi Niththiya Piradhaana Aasaariyaraai Namakkaaga Andha Thiraikkul Piravesiththirukkiraar.
